Sentence.sentence: Researchers who share get plenty of personal benefits, including more connections with colleagues, improved visibility and increased citations.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Closings were simple, practical, and accessible, as the modern woman depended on no personal maid to dress her.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Today's teenagers admire their parents and welcome parental guidance about important matters such as career choice—though certainly not Mom and Dad's advice on matters of personal taste, such as music or fashion.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It is fine and healthy for teens to cultivate their personal interests, and it is good news when young people enjoy harmonious relations with their family and friends.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Interviews with students find many of them are only concerned about personal matters.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Asked what they would like to change in the world, the students mentioned only personal concerns such as slowing down the pace of life, gaining good friends, becoming more spiritual, becoming either more materially successful or less materially oriented ( ' , depending on the student's values), and being more respectful of the Earth, animals and other people.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Consumers  are  becoming  more  worried  about  giving  personal  information  to  tech  companies  to  get  customized products and services.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A huge portion of our lives involves the surrender of our freedom and personal autonomy.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Asked what they would like to change in the world, the students mentioned only personal concerns such as slowing down the pace of life, gaining good friends, becoming more spiritual, becoming either more materially successful or less materially oriented d
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: But to build up my own finances, I need around 20% more in personal savings and 50% less debt.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Even so, they can rarely without subsidized support address serious personal needs.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: From the lack of secure, affordable housing to growing job insecurity and rising personal debt, the individual is trapped.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Having your personal satellite launched into orbit might sound like an idea straight out of science fiction.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Here is the most malignant threat to our personal freedom, particularly as the balance of power in the workplace has been shifted so dramatically from worker to boss.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: However, the flying car has always remained the ultimate symbol of personal transport freedom.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: I am the kind of person that if my personal life is hurting, I can go to work and the music will take over.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Personal technology is indeed more engaging than ever, and there's no doubt companies are engineering their products and services to be more compelling and attractive.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They found that the average person's mind wandered most frequently about 65% of the time during personal activities, such as brushing their teeth and combing their hair.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"个人的，私人的"之意。
means: personal ： 指属于或关于某人或某些特定的人，以区别于其他人。
private ： 指属于私人所有或具有私营性质，以区别于集体或公共的，有时含不公开的意味。
individual ： 与集体的相对，指个别或个体的。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词"人,物,状态"; 2. 地方; 3. 表形容词,"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: mur墙壁+al人,物,状态→adj.墙壁的 n.壁画
riv=river+al人,物,状态→竞争
affection爱;感情+al……的→adj.情感上的,爱情的
agriculture农业+al……的→adj.农业的,农艺的
clinic临床+al……的→adj.临床的,病房用的
con共同+gen出生+it+al……的→与生俱来
continent大陆+al……的→adj.大陆的,大陆性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 连续的,频繁的,持续不断的

emotion情绪+al……的→adj.情绪的,情感的
exception例外+al……的→adj.例外的,异常的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 附带的,伴随的,非主要的,偶然的,容易发生的
stems_affixes.word_buile: incident偶然事件+al……的→附带的,偶然的

Sentence.sentence: A decade of data breaches (数据侵入) of personal information has led to a situation where scammers can easily learn your mother's name, and far more.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: And at that moment, I made the decision: I will develop and follow a personal growth plan for my life.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: As I began my own personal weight program, I was filled with the fear that I would.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: As I sat in my own personal heaven, I started thinking about having more.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: Cell-phones are part of a growing mountain of electronic waste like computers and personal digital assistants.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: For example, people volunteer to express personal values related to unselfishness, to expand their range of experiences, and to strengthen social relationships.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: If a basketball star is, for example, trying to gain a high personal point total, he may take a shot himself when it would be better to pass the ball to a teammate, affecting the team's performance.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Irresponsible use of a fire extinguisher can create a dangerous situation for other residents and could result in damage to personal property.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: It was assumed that those people for whom the role of volunteer was most part of their personal identity would also be most likely to continue volunteer work.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Making right career choices is crucial to personal success.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 选项

Sentence.sentence: Naomi managed to figure out 16 of Steve's favorite, and most personal songs.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Not everyone knows clearly how to build personal savings, but a savings plan started on a website has helped many put away a nice tidy sum.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Nurses and other care-givers need to be aware of the possible meanings of silence when they come across the personal anxiety their patients may be experiencing.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Nurses should recognize their own personal and cultural construction of silence so that a patient's silence is not interrupted too early or allowed to go on unnecessarily.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Outdoor adventure out take yourself out of your comfort zone for a week, discover new personal qualities, and learn new skills.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Success means getting personal desires satisfied.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读B 选项

Sentence.sentence: The following items are approved for use in residential rooms: electric blankets, hair dryers, personal computers, radios, televisions and dvd players.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The lessons they learned may not be different from what they would have gotten in school, but are certainly more personal and meaningful, because they had to work them out on their own.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The letter ended with a personal request: "Boy, on my next birthday, just tell me to wake up and get going, because I will have one less year to do things and there are ten million things waiting to be done."
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: The reason why someone is triggered by something and others are not is often due to one's personal history and psychological traits.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Then the last thing is about filling in a form with up-to-date personal data.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: To calculate just how much mothers would earn from that labour, it suggested some of the roles that mums could take on, including housekeeper, part-time lawyer, personal trainer and entertainer.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: While we were eating, Kurt asked me, " John, what is your plan for personal growth?"
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Your personal circumstances are equally important.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: In facts, the more new things we try- the more we step outside our comfort zone - the more inherently creative we become, both in the workplace and in our personal lives.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Especially significant was his view of freedom, which, for him, was associated with the rights and responsibilities of the individual: he advocated freedom of thought and of personal expression.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: You make further inferences, for instance, about how the test may be significant to you, or about its validity—inferences that form the basis of a personal response for which the author will inevitably be far less responsible.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Orin Kerr, a law professor, compares the explosion and accessibility of digital information in the 21st century with the establishment of automobile use as a virtual necessity of life in the 20th: The justices had to specify novel rules for the new personal domain of the passenger car then; they must sort out how the Fourth Amendment applies to digital information now.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Millennials, it seems, face the paradox of being the least formal generation yet the most conscious of style and personal branding.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Hire a personal stylist, or use the free styling service of a store like J.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Officials must not be allowed to play favorites in providing information or in arranging meetings simply because an individual or group provides a campaign donation or a personal gift.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: "I don't think the findings that we have are any evidence of personal delusion," says Epley.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: "Many young people assume a great deal of personal responsibility for educating themselves and actively seeking out opposing viewpoints,"  the survey concluded.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: "This indicates there is a real personal responsibility in counteracting this problem," says Roxanne Stone, editor in chief at Barna Group.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: A further concern is that the use of electronic means of payment leaves an electronic trail that contains a large amount of personal data.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: At the very least, it has awoken us from our national fever dream of easy riches and bigger houses, and put a necessary end to an era of reckless personal spending.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: hire a personal stylist, or use the free styling of a store like J.Crew.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: In fact, the more new things we try - the more we step outside our comfort zone - the more inherently creative we become, both in the workplace and in our personal lives.
Sentence.come: 2009年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: millennials, it seems, face the paradox of being the least formal generation yet the most conscious of style and personal branding.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Orin Kerr, a law professor, compares the explosion and accessibility of digital information in the 21st century with the establishment of automobile use as a virtual necessity of life in the 20th: The justices had to specify novel rules for the new person
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: So don't be afraid to ask more personal questions.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The lesson is not that you should make your personal life an open book, but rather, when given the option to offer up details about yourself or painstakingly conceal them, you should just be honest.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The Romantics commemorated the leading painters and authors of their day, stressing the uniqueness of the artist's personal experience rather than public glory.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: This aversion to arguments is common, but it depends on a mistaken view of arguments that causes profound problems for our personal and social lives- and in many ways misses the point of arguing in the first place.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）翻译 Section Ⅲ

Sentence.sentence: This new focus on personal fulfillment can help keep employees motivated amid increasingly loud debates over work-life balance.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: While more families buck an older-generation proclivity to leave kids in the dark about real estate decisions, realty agents and psychologists have mixed views about the financial, personal and long-term effects kids'opinions may have.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: While seemingly innocent, this loss of mental focus can potentially have a damaging impact on our professional, social, and personal wellbeing.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Young people who are still getting started in life were more likely than older adults to prioritize personal fulfillment in their work, to believe they will advance their careers most by regularly changing jobs, to favor communities with more public servi
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: On his release the police returned all his personal effects.
sentences.cn: 他被释放的时候, 警察退还了他的全部个人财物。

sentences.en: It's a personal letter.
sentences.cn: 这是私人信件。

sentences.en: He wanted to have a personal visit to that factory.
sentences.cn: 他想亲自去参观那家工厂。

means.word_mean: 人身攻击的, 无礼的

sentences.en: You can't make personal abuse on her.
sentences.cn: 你不可对她进行人身攻击。

means.word_mean: 人际的，个性的；私人的，私事的；为某个人做的，个别的；人身的，身体的</seg>

sentence.cn: 您的个人情况同样重要。
sentence.en: Your personal circumstances are equally important.
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

entry.def: A personal opinion, quality, or thing belongs or relates to one particular person rather than to other people.

example.ex: He learned this lesson the hard way — from his own personal experience...
example.tran: 吃一堑长一智，他这个教训来之不易——是从他自己的亲身经历中得来的。

entry.def: If you give something your personal care or attention, you deal with it yourself rather than letting someone else deal with it.

example.ex: ...a business that requires a great deal of personal contact.
example.tran: 经常需要本人亲自联系、打理的生意

example.ex: ...a personal letter from the President's secretary...
example.tran: 总统秘书亲自寄出的信

entry.def: Personal matters relate to your feelings, relationships, and health.
entry.tran: （感情、关系、健康方面）个人的，人际的，自己的

example.ex: ...teaching young people about marriage and personal relationships...
example.tran: 教导年轻人有关婚姻和人际关系方面的事情

example.ex: You never allow personal problems to affect your performance...
example.tran: 绝不要让个人问题影响你的表现。

entry.def: Personal comments refer to someone's appearance or character in an offensive way.
entry.tran: 针对个人的；人身攻击的

example.tran: 报纸采取了人身攻击的手段。

example.ex: Myra was attacking something I'd written, and her attack got a little personal.
example.tran: 迈拉批评我写的东西，她的批评多少有些人身攻击的味道。

entry.def: Personal care involves looking after your body and appearance.

example.ex: ...men who take as much trouble over personal hygiene as women.
example.tran: 像女人一样不嫌麻烦打理个人卫生的男人

entry.def: A personal relationship is one that is not connected with your job or public life.

example.ex: He was a personal friend whom I've known for many many years...
example.tran: 他是一位我认识多年的私人朋友。

example.ex: What began as a professional relationship became a personal one pretty quickly, despite us coming from very different backgrounds.
example.tran: 尽管我们各自背景不同，但我们还是很快从工作关系发展成了私下的好朋友。

means.word_mean: 1. a short newspaper article about a particular person or group
1. concerning or affecting a particular person or his or her private life and personality;

sentences.sentence: "I have something personal to tell you"
"he has his personal bank account and she has hers"

means.word_mean: 4. intimately concerning a person's body or physical being;

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin personalis 'of a person', from persona (see person)

sentences.cn: 私人物品 / 财产 / 财物
sentences.en: personal effects/belongings/possessions

sentences.cn: 个人基本资料
sentences.en: personal details (= your name, age, etc.)

sentences.cn: 当然了，这只是个人意见。
sentences.en: Of course, this is just a personal opinion.

sentences.cn: 库根跑出了刚好低于四分钟的个人最好成绩。
sentences.en: Coogan has run a personal best of just under four minutes.

sentences.cn: 这部小说是根据个人亲身经历写成的。
sentences.en: The novel is written from personal experience .

sentences.cn: 用型板给墙壁和家具增添些个人风格。
sentences.en: Use stencils to add a few personal touches to walls and furniture.

sentences.cn: 所有租赁车辆仅供个人使用。
sentences.en: All hire cars are for personal use only.

sentences.cn: 拥有良好的人际关系对我最为重要。
sentences.en: Having good personal relationships is the most important thing for me.

sentences.cn: 他的人品和他的管理技巧同样受到人们的喜爱。
sentences.en: He was popular as much for his personal qualities as for his management skills.

sentences.cn: 信上标注着“私人”字样。
sentences.en: The letter was marked ‘Personal ’.

sentences.cn: 我想和你谈点私事。
sentences.en: I'd like to talk to you about a personal matter.

sentences.cn: 我尽量不让工作干扰我的私生活。
sentences.en: I try not to let work interfere with my personal life .

sentences.cn: 她是我的私人朋友。
sentences.en: She's a personal friend of mine (= not just somebody I know because of my job) .

sentences.cn: 总统亲临现场。
sentences.en: The President made a personal appearance at the event.

sentences.cn: 我将亲自处理此事。
sentences.en: I shall give the matter my personal attention.

sentences.cn: 我们为所有顾客提供个别服务。
sentences.en: We offer a personal service to all our customers.

sentences.cn: （私营公司的）个人养老金计划
sentences.en: a personal pension plan (= a pension organized by a private company for one particular person)

sentences.cn: 要尽量避免针对个人的言论。
sentences.en: Try to avoid making personal remarks.

sentences.cn: 没有必要搞人身攻击嘛！
sentences.en: There's no need to get personal !

sentences.cn: 吃一堑长一智，他这个教训来之不易——是从他自己的亲身经历中得来的。
sentences.en: He learned this lesson the hard way — from his own personal experience...

sentences.cn: 那是我的个人观点。
sentences.en: That's my personal opinion.

sentences.cn: 经常需要本人亲自联系、打理的生意
sentences.en: ...a business that requires a great deal of personal contact.

sentences.cn: 总统秘书亲自寄出的信
sentences.en: ...a personal letter from the President's secretary...

sentences.cn: 教导年轻人有关婚姻和人际关系方面的事情
sentences.en: ...teaching young people about marriage and personal relationships...

sentences.cn: 绝不要让个人问题影响你的表现。
sentences.en: You never allow personal problems to affect your performance...

sentences.cn: 报纸采取了人身攻击的手段。
sentences.en: Newspapers resorted to personal abuse...

sentences.cn: 迈拉批评我写的东西，她的批评多少有些人身攻击的味道。
sentences.en: Myra was attacking something I'd written, and her attack got a little personal.

sentences.cn: 像女人一样不嫌麻烦打理个人卫生的男人
sentences.en: ...men who take as much trouble over personal hygiene as women.

sentences.cn: 他是一位我认识多年的私人朋友。
sentences.en: He was a personal friend whom I've known for many many years...

sentences.cn: 尽管我们各自背景不同，但我们还是很快从工作关系发展成了私下的好朋友。
sentences.en: What began as a professional relationship became a personal one pretty quickly, despite us coming from very different backgrounds.

sentences.cn: 要尽量避免针对个人的言论。
sentences.en: Try to avoid making personal remarks.

sentences.cn: 最好的批评就是完全针对个人的，且能一针见血地指出为何短文会按某种方式写就。
sentences.en: Criticism, at its best, is deeply personal, and gets to the heart of why we write the way we do.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 他不能逃避个人的责任.
sentences.en: He can not sidle away from personal responsibility.

sentences.cn: 我的本意是提一点儿建设性的意见, 可他认为是对他个人的侮辱.
sentences.en: I meant it as a bit of constructive advice, but he took it as a personal insult.

sentences.cn: 我的个人的感情歪曲了我对这个事件的判断.
sentences.en: My personal feelings color my judgment in this case.

sentences.cn: 我们有非常个人的政治观点, 但是我们并不将它们明显地表达出来.
sentences.en: We had very personal political views, but we didn't let them come through.

sentences.cn: 体验目标是简单 、 通用且个人的.
sentences.en: Experience goals are simple, universal, and personal.

sentences.cn: 这是官方的“命令”还是个人的要求?
sentences.en: Is this authoritative order or a personal request?

sentences.cn: 这依赖于个人的兴趣.
sentences.en: It depends on personal interests.

sentences.cn: 它可以给你带来成功 、 胜利 、 专业技术、个人的成长.
sentences.en: It can give you success, victories, and professional and personal growth.

sentences.cn: 他们失去了个人的物品,面临很大危险.
sentences.en: They have lost their personal possessions and are exposed to many risks.

sentences.cn: 我不愿意过问他个人的事.
sentences.en: I don't want to have a hand in his personal affairs.

sentences.cn: 我个人的见解是,这个狮子是第二只.
sentences.en: My personal opinion is that this lion might have been a second one.

sentences.cn: 每晚散步是他个人的生活规律之一.
sentences.en: Taking a walk every evening was one of his personal laws.

sentences.cn: 记者:这届比赛,你个人的目标是什么?
sentences.en: What is your personal goal at the tournament?

sentences.cn: 以考虑个人的需要为先, 还要维护自己的成就感.
sentences.en: Take care of your personal needs, and maintain your sense of well being.

sentences.cn: 但千万不要用牵涉个人的评语或问题,像是: [ 唷!你体重又增加了!
sentences.en: But don't make use of personal comments or questions like " Boy, you've put on weight! "

sentences.cn: 事实上老板们并不把我们个人的需要看成是工作中一个重要的因素.
sentences.en: Bosses don't often view our personal wants as an important factor to the job.

sentences.cn: 普拉格(美国《时代》杂志海外版编辑 ): 我想问一个关于你个人的问题.
sentences.en: Karsten Prager ( Editor international edition of Time ): I should like to ask a personal question.

sentences.cn: 和地震造成的灾难性破坏相比, 我个人的这点损失实在算不了什么.
sentences.en: In comparison with the disastrous damage made by the earthquake, my personal loss is negligible.

sentences.cn: 让你的答案基于工作机会而不是个人的要求.
sentences.en: Make your answer oriented toward opportunity rather than personal security.

sentences.cn: 以我个人的观点,我们有太多的健康计划,却没有足够的医生.
sentences.en: It's my personal opinion that we have many health plans and not enough doctors.

sentences.cn: 他已摆脱了一切个人的牵累.
sentences.en: He had put off all personal cares.

sentences.cn: 浪费, 排场, 宴会都是来满足个人的私欲, 权力和斗争.
sentences.en: Lavishment , ostentation and extravagance, banquet, all these are to fulfill personal selfish desire, power and battle.

sentences.cn: 这可说又回到了前文说的道家观念,亦即个人的循环与宇宙的循环的对应.
sentences.en: This again refers back to the Daoist concept of personal and cosmic circulation.

sentences.cn: 奥巴马政府出于个人的原因支持基金组织.
sentences.en: The Obama administration has personal reasons to support the fund.

sentences.cn: 时间控制不是一门精确的科学, 而是一种个人的艺术.
sentences.en: Time manipulation is not a precise science. Like any art, it's personal to the individual.

sentences.cn: 这个世界已经习惯以一个人事业上的成功来衡量一个人的价值.
sentences.en: This world already accustom as an individual career on's successful come measure a personal value.

sentences.cn: 他们出于个人的原因反对我.
sentences.en: They objected to me on personal grounds.

sentences.cn: 向神降伏比追求个人的圣洁更有价值.
sentences.en: Abandon to God is of more value than personal holiness.

sentences.cn: 所以不要是怯于问更私人的问题。
sentences.en: So don't be afraid to ask more personal questions.

sentences.cn: 别人对你的态度冷热大部分都非私人的想法.
sentences.en: The ups and downs of life , the warmth and coldness of others, aren't personal at all.

sentences.cn: 那位牺牲了的士兵是通过他私人的财物被识别的.
sentences.en: The dead soldier was identified only by his uniform and personal belongings.

sentences.cn: 个人的娱乐空间, 私人的派对专场, 与家人共享的美好时光.
sentences.en: Personal recreation space, special private party, a happy time to share with family.

sentences.cn: 她编辑了该政治家的信件,从中删除了最私人的内容.
sentences.en: She edited the letters of the politician so as to omit the most personal passages.

sentences.cn: 通过我们私人的友谊我获益非浅.
sentences.en: I am the gainer by our personal friendship.

sentences.cn: 只有愿意与他人分享自己真实、私人的经历或是情感, 人与人之间的接触才是真实可靠的.
sentences.en: It's when people share something real and personal, that these real connections are made.

sentences.cn: 这些个是小我私人的危害. 那末政治的危害在哪 呢 ?
sentences.en: Those are the personal risks. Now where're the political risks?

sentences.cn: 我们需要在意空闲的时间, 私人的时间, 家庭时间, 人们花费的时间以及浪费的时间.
sentences.en: We need to care about free time, personal time, family time, spending time, and wasting time.

sentences.cn: 当这一切开始发生的时候, 你不得不去猜测这是不是有些私人的偏见而不是以专业的眼光来看的.
sentences.en: When that starts happening, you have to assume it is something personal, rather than professional.

sentences.cn: 参加外面和相关公司的职能和私人的发展.
sentences.en: Attend outside training and functions related to the company and personal development.

sentences.cn: 切记: 小心避免非常私人的问题,例如年龄 、 薪水 、 婚姻状况和长相.
sentences.en: Remember: Be careful to avoid personal questions about age, salary, marital status and appearance.

sentences.cn: 别的事情, 我参加了个私人的聚会, 认识了一些新的朋友, 很开心.
sentences.en: Others, I joined a personal party, met some new friends, enjoin that too.

sentences.cn: 这是一个涉及私人的故事,可它是整个画面的一部分.
sentences.en: It's a very personal story but it is part of the picture.

sentences.cn: 这个百万富翁有一位私人的理财顾问负责他的投资.
sentences.en: The millionaire had a personal finance consultant investhis money.

sentences.cn: 史派罗同意了, 却是为了他自己私人的理由.
sentences.en: Sparrow agrees, but for his own personal reasons.

sentences.cn: 这次采访都问得好私人的问题.
sentences.en: This is a very personal interview.

sentences.cn: 你必须把私人的所有物留在那柜子.
sentences.en: You must leave your personal effects in that locker.

sentences.cn: 我私人的电脑里有大量的游戏.
sentences.en: My personal computer is abundant in games.

sentences.cn: 惠普尔回复了维斯贝格,并邀请他们观看了一个私人的演示.
sentences.en: In response , Whipple offered to set Weisberg up with a personal demonstration.

sentences.cn: 你什么时候不再问这种私人的问题?
sentences.en: When are you going to stop asking such personal questions?

sentences.cn: 请问你是不是有一套私人的刀具?
sentences.en: I was wondering if you owned a personal set of knives.

sentences.cn: 他可能去弄她的衣服, 翻她私人的东西!
sentences.en: He might be handling her clothes, looking through her personal things.

sentences.cn: 人类的天性中有一种无法克服的倾向,就是要使每件东西都担负上私人的意义.
sentences.en: There is an incurable tendency in the human mind to overload things with personal significance.

sentences.cn: 私人教练是您的私人健身顾问,制定完善的私人的训练饮食计划.
sentences.en: Private coach is your personal fitness consultant to develop a private training diet plan.

sentences.cn: 问私人的问题是不礼貌的.
sentences.en: It is impolite to ask personal questions.

sentences.cn: 我想跟你说一件私人的事. 你可以保守秘密 吗 ?
sentences.en: I have something personal I want to tell you. Can you keep a secret?

sentences.cn: 你不辞辛苦地写一封私人的倍感亲切的信.
sentences.en: You are going to the trouble of writing a personal, thoughtful letter.

sentences.cn: 主持人: 聊了这么多, 问您个私人的问题, 您的个人理想是 什么 ?
sentences.en: Compere : about so much, ask you a personal question, what is your individual ideal?

sentences.cn: 私人的证明信将不被接受.
sentences.en: Personal references will not be accepted as evidence.

sentences.cn: 我也有他亲自的担保他永不离开丢弃我.
sentences.en: I also have his personal guarantee that he will never leave me or forsake me.

sentences.cn: 报纸采取了人身攻击的手段。
sentences.en: Newspapers resorted to personal abuse...

sentences.cn: 迈拉批评我写的东西，她的批评多少有些人身攻击的味道。
sentences.en: Myra was attacking something I'd written, and her attack got a little personal.

sentences.cn: 对他的攻击简直堕落到了人身攻击的地步.
sentences.en: The attack on him descended to a level of personal character assassination.

sentences.cn: 如果他一意孤行进行人身攻击的话,我将以其人之道还治其人这身.
sentences.en: If he persists in making personal rmarks I shall pay him back in the same coin.

sentences.cn: 南大站不应该沦落成人身攻击的击拳台和市集场所.
sentences.en: Nandazhan should not deteriorate into a boxing ring and market place where people utter personal insults.

sentences.cn: 我办报纸十分谨慎,凡无端诽谤,人身攻击的文章一概不登.
sentences.en: In the conduct of my newspaper, I carefully excluded all libeling and personal abuse.

sentences.cn: 报纸采取了人身攻击的手段。
sentences.en: Newspapers resorted to personal abuse.

sentences.cn: 迈拉批评我写的东西，她的批评多少有些人身攻击的味道。
sentences.en: Myra was attacking something I'd written, and her attack got a little personal.

sentences.cn: 主格人称代名词担任句子里面的主语或主语的补语.
sentences.en: Subjective personal pronouns act as subjects or subject complements in sentences.

sentences.cn: 注: 人称代名词的格所指的是人称代名词在句子中的功能.
sentences.en: Remark: Cases refer to the function of a personal pronoun in a sentence.

sentences.cn: 受格人称代名词担任动词或介词的受词.
sentences.en: Objective personal pronouns act as objects of verbs or prepositions.

sentences.cn: 论文标题: “ 人称代词+的+名词 ” 与 “ 人称代+名词 ” 的比较研究.
sentences.en: The Comparative Study of " Personal Pronoun + de + Noun " and " Personal Pronoun + Noun "
